Chinese.name: dish.sweet_and_sour_pork
instructions: Cut pork into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper
Heat oil in a wok over high heat
Add pork and stir-fry until golden brown, about 5-6 minutes
Add bell peppers and onion to wok, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes
Return pork to wok with sauce mixture
Toss everything together until sauce thickens

Chinese.name: dish.braised_lions_head_meatballs
instructions: Mix ground pork with ginger, soy sauce, and egg
Heat oil in a large pot and brown meatballs on all sides
Pour in soy sauce and water mixture
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes

Chinese.name: dish.shandong_dumplings
instructions: Make dough with flour and water, knead until smooth
Mix pork with cabbage, ginger, and soy sauce
Roll out dough and cut into circles
Place filling in center of each circle
Fold and seal edges to form dumplings
Boil dumplings in water for 8-10 minutes

Chinese.name: dish.dezhou_braised_chicken
instructions: Season whole chicken with soy sauce and spices
Heat oil in a large pot and brown chicken on all sides
Add ginger, garlic, and star anise
Pour in soy sauce and water mixture
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 1 hour

Chinese.name: dish.mapo_tofu
instructions: Heat oil in a wok over medium-high heat
Add ground pork and stir-fry until browned
Add garlic, ginger, and chili bean paste
Add tofu and gently toss to combine
Add soy sauce and simmer for 5 minutes
Thicken with cornstarch slurry if needed
Garnish with green onions and serve hot

Chinese.name: dish.kung_pao_chicken
instructions: Mix soy sauce, rice vinegar, sugar, cornstarch, and water in a bowl. Set aside
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat
Add chicken and stir-fry for 5-6 minutes until golden. Remove and set aside
Add remaining oil, dried chilies, and Sichuan peppercorns
Add bell peppers and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until slightly softened
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant
Return chicken to wok and add sauce mixture
Toss everything together for 2 minutes until sauce thickens
Add peanuts and green onions, stir for 30 seconds

Chinese.name: dish.pork_ribs_with_black_bean_sauce
instructions: Season pork ribs with salt and pepper
Heat oil in a large pot and brown ribs on all sides
Add garlic, ginger, and black beans
Add soy sauce and water mixture
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 1 hour

Chinese.name: dish.steamed_fish_with_ginger_and_scallions
instructions: Place fish on a heatproof plate
Scatter ginger and half the scallions over fish
Steam fish for 8-10 minutes until cooked through
Heat soy sauce and sesame oil in a small pan
Pour hot sauce over steamed fish

Chinese.name: dish.char_siu_cantonese_bbq_pork
instructions: Mix hoisin sauce, honey, garlic, and five-spice powder
Marinate pork in sauce for at least 2 hours
Place pork on a rack in a roasting pan
Roast for 45-60 minutes, basting every 15 minutes
Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing
Serve with steamed rice and vegetables

Chinese.name: dish.dongpo_pork_belly
ingredientsWithAmounts: 1 lb pork belly, cut into large chunks
instructions: Cut pork belly into large chunks
Heat oil in a wok and brown pork on all sides
Add ginger and scallions, stir-fry for 1 minute
Add soy sauce, rice wine, and water
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 2-3 hours

Chinese.name: dish.hunan_beef
instructions: Heat oil in a wok over high heat
Add beef and stir-fry until browned, about 3-4 minutes
Add bell peppers and onion, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes
Add garlic and chilies, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add soy sauce and stir-fry for 1 minute

Chinese.name: dish.buddha_jumps_over_the_wall
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and cut into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in a large pot and brown chicken and pork
Pour in wine and water mixture
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 2-3 hours

Chinese.name: dish.redbraised_pork
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and brown pork on all sides
Add ginger and rock sugar, stir-fry until sugar melts
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 1 hour

Chinese.name: dish.chicken_fried_rice
instructions: Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat
Add beaten eggs and scramble until just set. Remove and set aside
Add 2 tbsp oil and chicken to wok
Stir-fry chicken for 5-6 minutes until cooked through. Remove and set aside
Add remaining oil and onion to wok
Stir-fry onion for 2-3 minutes until softened
Add garlic and mixed vegetables, stir-fry for 2 minutes
Add rice and break up any clumps
Stir-fry rice for 3-4 minutes until heated through
Return chicken and eggs to wok
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and white pepper
Garnish with green onions and serve hot

Japanese.name: dish.sushi_rolls_maki
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package directions
Mix rice vinegar and sugar, then fold into warm rice
Place nori sheet on bamboo mat
Spread rice evenly over nori, leaving 1 inch border
Add fish and vegetables in a line across center
Slice into 6-8 pieces with sharp knife
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger

Japanese.name: dish.teriyaki_chicken
instructions: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, and ginger for sauce
Marinate chicken in half the sauce for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a wok over high heat
Add chicken and stir-fry until cooked through
Add remaining sauce and simmer until thick

Japanese.name: dish.miso_ramen
instructions: Boil noodles according to package directions
Heat oil in a pot and brown pork
Add miso paste and water, bring to a boil
Add noodles and eggs to broth
Cook for 2-3 minutes until eggs are set
Garnish with scallions and serve hot

Japanese.name: dish.tonkatsu
instructions: Dredge in flour, egg, then breadcrumbs

Japanese.name: dish.yakitori
instructions: Make tare sauce with soy, mirin, sake, sugar

Japanese.name: dish.okonomiyaki
instructions: Mix flour with water and eggs

Japanese.name: dish.chawanmushi
instructions: Place shrimp and mushrooms in cups

Japanese.name: dish.karaage
instructions: Marinate with soy sauce, garlic, ginger

Japanese.name: dish.oyakodon
instructions: Heat dashi with soy sauce and mirin

Japanese.name: dish.katsudon
instructions: Heat dashi with soy sauce and mirin
Cover and cook until eggs set

Japanese.name: dish.takoyaki
instructions: Mix flour with eggs and dashi
Turn with skewers to form balls
Top with sauce, mayo, and flakes

Japanese.name: dish.agedashi_tofu
instructions: Make dashi broth with soy sauce and mirin

Japanese.name: dish.nikujaga
instructions: Add dashi, soy sauce, sugar, mirin

Japanese.name: dish.gyoza
instructions: Chop cabbage and salt to remove water
Mix pork with cabbage, garlic, ginger
Add soy sauce and sesame oil

Japanese.name: dish.miso_soup
instructions: Heat dashi to just below boiling

Korean.name: dish.kimchi_fried_rice
instructions: Heat oil in a wok over high heat
Add onion and stir-fry until softened
Add kimchi and stir-fry for 2 minutes
Add rice and break up clumps
Stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until heated through
Make a well in center and add eggs
Scramble eggs and mix with rice
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil

Korean.name: dish.bulgogi
instructions: Make marinade with soy sauce, garlic, ginger

Korean.name: dish.galbi
instructions: Make marinade with soy sauce, garlic, pear

Korean.name: dish.japchae
ingredientsWithAmounts: Mixed vegetables (carrots, spinach, mushrooms, bell peppers)
instructions: Add soy sauce and sesame oil

Korean.name: dish.tteokbokki
instructions: Make sauce with gochujang, sugar, soy sauce
Add rice cakes and fish cakes

Korean.name: dish.bibimbap
instructions: Serve with gochujang and sesame oil

Korean.name: dish.samgyeopsal
instructions: Cut pork belly into thick slices

Korean.name: dish.haemul_pajeon
instructions: Mix flour with water and eggs

Korean.name: dish.dakgalbi
instructions: Make sauce with gochujang, garlic, soy sauce

Korean.name: dish.sundubu_jjigae
instructions: Add water and bring to boil

Korean.name: dish.gimbap
instructions: Season rice with sesame oil and salt

Korean.name: dish.bossam
instructions: Boil pork belly with garlic and ginger

Korean.name: dish.naengmyeon
instructions: Cook noodles and rinse in cold water

Italian.name: dish.spaghetti_carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions
Reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining
Heat oil in a large pan and cook pancetta until crisp
Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds
Remove from heat and add hot pasta
Beat eggs with cheese and pepper
Quickly toss pasta with egg mixture
Add pasta water if needed for creaminess

Italian.name: dish.margherita_pizza
instructions: Roll out dough on floured surface
Place on oiled baking sheet or pizza stone
Spread tomato sauce evenly over dough
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden
Garnish with fresh basil before serving

French.name: dish.coq_au_vin
instructions: Season chicken with salt and pepper
Add wine and bring to boil

French.name: dish.beef_bourguignon
instructions: Add wine and bring to boil

French.name: dish.bouillabaisse
instructions: Add fish stock and bring to boil

French.name: dish.sole_meunire
instructions: Season fish with salt and pepper

French.name: dish.french_onion_soup
instructions: Cook slowly in butter for 45 minutes

French.name: dish.escargots
instructions: Mix butter with garlic and parsley

French.name: dish.steak_frites
instructions: Season steaks with salt and pepper
Add butter and herbs to steaks

French.name: dish.duck_lorange
instructions: Carve duck and serve with sauce

French.name: dish.moules_marinires
instructions: Add wine and bring to boil

Indian.name: dish.butter_chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 30 minutes
Heat butter in a pan and cook chicken until golden
In the same pan, add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes
Add cream, garam masala, and salt
Return chicken to pan and simmer for 15 minutes
Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan

Indian.name: dish.chicken_tikka_masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spices for 2 hours
Grill or broil chicken until charred
Heat oil in pan, add onions and cook until soft
Add tomato sauce and cook for 15 minutes

Indian.name: dish.palak_paneer
instructions: Blanch spinach and blend into smooth puree
Add onions and cook until golden
Pour spinach puree and cook for 10 minutes

Indian.name: dish.chicken_biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour
Cook rice 70% done and set aside
Fry onions until golden and crispy
Layer marinated chicken, rice, fried onions, and saffron milk
Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 30 minutes

Indian.name: dish.samosas
instructions: Make dough with flour, oil, and water, rest for 30 minutes
Cook cumin seeds, add mashed potatoes, peas, and spices
Roll dough into thin circles, cut in half
Form cone shape, fill with potato mixture

Indian.name: dish.tandoori_chicken
instructions: Make deep cuts in chicken pieces
Mix yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, and ginger-garlic paste
Marinate chicken for at least 2 hours or overnight
Place chicken on a wire rack

Indian.name: dish.dal_makhani
instructions: Soak lentils overnight, pressure cook until soft
Heat butter in pan, add ginger-garlic paste
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes
Add cooked lentils and simmer for 20 minutes
Stir in cream and garam masala

Indian.name: dish.rogan_josh
instructions: Heat oil and brown lamb pieces
Add whole spices and fry until fragrant
Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes
Return lamb, add water, and simmer for 45 minutes

Indian.name: dish.chana_masala
instructions: Add onions and cook until golden
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes
Add chana masala and other spices
Add chickpeas and simmer for 15 minutes

Indian.name: dish.aloo_gobi
instructions: Add potatoes and fry for 5 minutes
Cover and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally

Indian.name: dish.vindaloo
instructions: Make paste of garlic, chilies, cumin, and vinegar
Marinate pork in paste for 30 minutes
Add marinated pork and cook on high heat
Add water and simmer for 40 minutes
Adjust seasoning with salt and sugar

Indian.name: dish.korma
instructions: Grind cashews with water to make paste
Heat ghee, add cardamom and whole spices
Add onion puree and cook until golden
Add yogurt and cook for 5 minutes
Simmer until chicken is cooked, about 20 minutes

Indian.name: dish.pav_bhaji
instructions: Boil and mash all vegetables together
Heat butter in pan, add onions
Add pav bhaji masala and cook for 2 minutes
Add mashed vegetables and mix well
Cook for 15 minutes, mashing and stirring
Toast pav with butter on griddle

Indian.name: dish.masala_dosa
instructions: Heat oil, add mustard seeds and curry leaves
Add mashed potatoes and mix well
Heat dosa pan, pour batter in circular motion
Fold and serve with chutney and sambar

Indian.name: dish.idli
instructions: For sambar: Cook dal and vegetables with tamarind
Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves
Serve hot idlis with sambar and coconut chutney

Indian.name: dish.malai_kofta
instructions: Mix mashed potatoes, paneer, and spices
Form into balls, deep fry until golden
Cook tomato puree with cashew paste
Add fried koftas just before serving
Garnish with cream and serve with naan

Indian.name: dish.chole_bhature
instructions: Make dough with flour, yogurt, and oil, rest 1 hour
Add chickpeas and simmer for 20 minutes
Roll dough into circles, deep fry until puffed

Indian.name: dish.raita
instructions: Grate cucumber and squeeze out excess water
Add roasted cumin powder and salt
Chill and serve with biryani or paratha

Thai.name: dish.pad_thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes
Heat oil in wok, add shrimp and cook until pink
Push shrimp to side, add beaten eggs and scramble
Add noodles and stir-fry for 2 minutes
Add tamarind, fish sauce, and palm sugar
Serve with lime wedges and chili flakes

Thai.name: dish.green_curry
instructions: Heat half the coconut milk in a pot
Add green curry paste and cook until fragrant
Add chicken and cook until sealed
Add remaining coconut milk and bring to boil
Add eggplant and simmer for 15 minutes
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar
Add Thai basil just before serving

Thai.name: dish.tom_yum_soup
instructions: Bring water to boil with lemongrass, galangal, and lime leaves
Add mushrooms and simmer for 5 minutes
Add shrimp and cook until pink
Season with fish sauce and lime juice
Add chilies and remove from heat

Thai.name: dish.massaman_curry
instructions: Heat coconut milk and add massaman paste
Add beef and brown on all sides
Add water and simmer for 30 minutes
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar

Thai.name: dish.som_tam
instructions: Pound chilies and garlic in mortar
Add fish sauce, lime juice, and palm sugar
Add green beans and pound lightly

Thai.name: dish.pad_krapow
instructions: Heat oil in wok, add garlic and chilies
Add ground chicken and cook until done
Add fish sauce, soy sauce, and oyster sauce
Add Thai basil and stir until wilted
Serve chicken over rice with fried egg

Thai.name: dish.red_curry
instructions: Heat half coconut milk, add red curry paste
Cook until fragrant and oil separates
Add chicken and cook until sealed
Add bamboo shoots and simmer 15 minutes
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar

Thai.name: dish.khao_soi
instructions: Heat coconut milk, add curry paste
Cook half the noodles soft, half crispy
Season with fish sauce and lime juice
Top with pickled greens and shallots

Thai.name: dish.larb
instructions: Remove from heat and cool slightly
Add fish sauce and lime juice

Thai.name: dish.satay
instructions: Marinate chicken in curry paste and coconut milk
For sauce: blend peanuts, coconut milk, curry paste
Season with fish sauce and lime juice

Thai.name: dish.panang_curry
instructions: Heat coconut milk, add panang paste
Add chicken and cook until sealed
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar

Thai.name: dish.tom_kha_gai
instructions: Bring coconut milk to boil with galangal, lemongrass, lime leaves
Season with fish sauce and lime juice

Thai.name: dish.pad_see_ew
instructions: Heat oil in wok, add chicken and cook
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, fish sauce
Push everything to side, add beaten eggs
Scramble eggs and mix with noodles

Thai.name: dish.mango_sticky_rice
instructions: Heat coconut milk with sugar and salt
Pour over hot rice and let absorb

Thai.name: dish.spring_rolls
instructions: Soak rice paper in warm water
Place shrimp and vegetables on rice paper

Thai.name: dish.crying_tiger
instructions: Marinate beef with garlic, soy sauce, and lime juice
Make sauce with chilies, fish sauce, lime juice

Thai.name: dish.kai_jeow
instructions: Beat eggs with fish sauce and white pepper
Heat oil in wok until very hot
Let bottom set, then fold over
Garnish with cilantro and green onions

Thai.name: dish.gaeng_keow_wan
instructions: Heat coconut milk, add green curry paste
Add vegetables and cook until tender
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar

Thai.name: dish.yum_woon_sen
instructions: Soak glass noodles in warm water
Mix lime juice, fish sauce, and chilies

Thai.name: dish.khao_pad
instructions: Add rice and break up clumps
Add soy sauce and fish sauce

Mexican.name: dish.tacos_al_pastor
instructions: Make marinade with chilies, vinegar, and spices
Serve in tortillas with onion and cilantro

Mexican.name: dish.enchiladas
instructions: Dip tortillas in sauce to soften
Roll and place in baking dish
Garnish with sour cream and cilantro

Mexican.name: dish.guacamole
instructions: Cut avocados in half and remove pits

Mexican.name: dish.mole_poblano
instructions: Blend chilies with nuts and spices

Mexican.name: dish.carnitas
instructions: Place in Dutch oven with citrus juice
Cover and cook at 300°F (150°C) for 3 hours

Mexican.name: dish.pozole
instructions: Cook pork in water with garlic and onion
Add shredded pork and chili puree

Mexican.name: dish.quesadillas
instructions: Serve with salsa and sour cream

Mexican.name: dish.tamales
instructions: Soak corn husks in warm water
Cook pork with chilies and spices
Shred pork and mix with sauce
Mix masa with lard and broth

Mexican.name: dish.fajitas
instructions: Marinate beef with lime juice and spices

Mexican.name: dish.ceviche
instructions: Marinate in lime juice for 2 hours
Drain fish and mix with vegetables

Mexican.name: dish.birria
instructions: Blend chilies with garlic and spices
Shred meat and return to broth

Mexican.name: dish.sopes
instructions: Mix masa with water and salt

Mexican.name: dish.cochinita_pibil
instructions: Make marinade with achiote and citrus
Line baking dish with banana leaves

Mexican.name: dish.salsa_verde
instructions: Serve with chips or as condiment

American.name: dish.beef_burger
instructions: Heat grill or pan to medium-high heat
Cook patties for 4-5 minutes per side
Add cheese during last minute of cooking

Greek.name: dish.moussaka
instructions: Salt eggplant slices and let sit for 30 minutes
Rinse and pat dry, then fry until golden
Brown meat with onion and garlic
Make béchamel sauce with butter, flour, and milk
Layer eggplant, meat sauce, and béchamel
Top with cheese and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes

Greek.name: dish.keftedes
instructions: Grate the onion and squeeze out excess moisture
In a large bowl, combine ground beef, grated onion, garlic, and herbs
Add breadcrumbs, beaten eggs, salt, and pepper
Mix everything together until well combined
Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes to firm up
Shape mixture into small balls (about 1.5 inches)
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Fry meatballs in batches until golden brown and cooked through
Drain on paper towels and serve hot
